text: explosions in central Oslo blew out the
windows of several government buildings
including the Norwegian Prime Minister's
Office killing at least seven shortly
after the blass a gunman opened fire on
an island summer camp for young members
of the governing Labour Party this is
alissa mala in Oslo for the New York
Times I was about a mile away from bus
when it happens this was a blast but
literally shook the entire city the
aftershock was so strong that hundreds
of feet away glass was just shattered in
in stores that were nowhere near the
government building shortly after the
blast there was a shooting on an island
called Sofia it's where a youth group
had been gathering and I'm told that
someone impersonating a police officer
just started shooting into the crowd
they're speculation that these two
incidents may be related there's also
speculation that this may be the result
of terrorist attacks but neither of
these speculations has been confirmed as
a yes this is quite a rude awakening in
a peaceful hablo there's a sense that
life here will never be the same again
